channel.title: Idiots of the cave on RidLines
channel.description: Recent content in Idiots of the cave on RidLines

item.title: The Pensieve
item.description: I wish I could replace threads and make this site so customizeable that I could change colors, run music in background, run custom HTML snippets et cetera…. I can do that but I’m too lazy(Actually, no I’ve got other things to do) :/ This is where I dump memories, anything. Acts like The Pensieve of Albus. One simply siphons the excess thoughts from one’s mind, pours them into the basin, and examines them at one’s leisure
